name: funding-rate
description: Retrieves historical funding rate data from Binance futures. Funding rates are periodic payments between long and short position holders. Output includes: funding rate (percentage), timestamp, and mark price. The data helps understand market sentiment and periodic costs for holding futures positions. If symbol is not specified, returns historical data for all trading pairs.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Optional Binance futures trading pair symbol (e.g., BTCUSDT). If omitted, returns history for all pairs

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of records to return (default: 100, max: 1000)
